fields.description:
h5. Description:
While trying to upload a status using the sample ti.cloud app, the upload fails. See screenshot. 

h5. Note:
This is a regression. It does not occur with 3.2.2.GA
This may be the same root cause as the linked ticket, so may be a duplicate

h5. Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a default Titanium classic app
2. Drop in example project from ti.cloud example folder
3. Install and launch app to an iOS device
4. Go to Users and create a user and log in
5. Press Back button to get to main menu and select "Status"
6. Press "Create Status"
7. Enter a message in the "Message" field
8. Choose either Photo option and add a photo
9. Press "Create"

h5. Result:
The status posting will fail. See screenshot

h5. Expected Result:
The status posting succeeds and the photo plus status can be viewed on the dashboard
fields.summary: iOS: Unable to post a status with attached photo to ACS
fields.environment:
Mac OS 10.9.2
Xcode 5.1.0
CLI: 3.2.1
Alloy: 1.3.1
Titanium SDK version 3.2.3.v20140320130134
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.2.3.201403190645

comments.body: Can you please take a look?
